General.Name: Jiangsu Fasten Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Fasten Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and sale of steel wires and wire ropes in China and internationally. It also designs and develops prefabricated parallel steel strands, prefabricated covered stay cables, dry air system equipment, anchors, suspenders, and prestressed structural cables; develops and produces building prestressed hardware products, corrugated hardware pipe fittings, and clip hardware products; produces architectural hardware products; and produces, develops, processes, and sells steel ropes and cords, and other steel wire rope products. In addition, the company wholesales wire rods, wire drawing dies, diamond dies, spare parts, and auxiliary raw materials; produces and sells nickel-titanium memory alloy products; and produces optical fibers, optical cables, and related products for communications markets. Further, it provides technical consultancy and after sales support services; disaster prevention, loss prevention or risk assessment, and risk management consulting services; formulates insurance plans for policyholders; and handles inspections and claims for the insured or beneficiaries on behalf of the insured or beneficiaries. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Jiangyin, China.
General.Address: No. 165, Chengjiang Middle Road, Jiangyin, China, 214433
